pages.text: $(li)Nylium is a variant of $(l:blocks/netherrack)Netherrack$(/l) that generates in the Nether. It has two variants: warped nylium and crimson nylium. $(li)Using bone meal on netherrack placed next to warped nylium or crimson nylium transforms the netherrack into more nylium.

pages.title: Crimson Nylium
pages.text: Crimson nylium generates in the $(l:biomes/crimson_forest)crimson forest$(/l) biome

pages.title: Warped Nylium
pages.text: Warped nylium generates in the $(l:biomes/warped_forest)warped forest$(/l) biome
